mapper.select: SELECT rev_id, u_id, a_post_id, r_date_created, r_content, r_star_rating, r_title FROM (SELECT seq, rev_id, u_id, a_post_id, r_date_created, r_content, r_star_rating, r_title FROM (SELECT ROWNUM AS seq, rev_id, u_id, a_post_id, r_date_created, r_content, r_star_rating, r_title FROM (SELECT activity_review.rev_id, activity_review.u_id, activity_review.a_post_id, activity_review.r_date_created, activity_review.r_content, activity_review.r_star_rating, activity_review.r_title from activity_review order by r_date_created DESC) ) WHERE seq >= #{startPostNo} ) WHERE ROWNUM <= #{endPostNo}
